body_html: I'd probably word the note a little different. The deal is that Conv doesn't always call cuDNN; it only calls it if your on CUDA and you have cuDNN and your convolution is one that is supported by cuDNN. So you want to write it more along the lines of, "Under some circumstances, this operator, when used on CUDA with cuDNN, may select a nondeterministic algorithm to increase performance. If you are seeing nondeterministic results and would like to make them more deterministic, try blah blah blah"
